topic.title: What is with zeronet.now.im?
topic.body:
https://zeronet.now.im/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/

Server error
Err: OSError: [Errno 24] Too many open files: 'src/Ui/template/wrapper.html' in UiServer.py line 107 > UiRequest.py line 192 > UiPluginManager/UiPluginManagerPlugin.py line 33 > UiFileManager/UiFileManagerPlugin.py line 21 > UiConfig/UiConfigPlugin.py line 20 > Multiuser/MultiuserPlugin.py line 64 > ContentFilter/ContentFilterPlugin.py line 232 > UiRequest.py line 430 > ProxyMessage/DonationMessagePlugin.py line 10 > UiRequest.py line 566 > 328

When will this bug be fixed?
Was there a server attack?

1608655431_14EvrR9QiEpqhQyZDFiftdgAXzNQ1.body: The languages are: English, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Polish and German.

Thank you for the translation in Serbian.
Hopefully we have chosen the right flag.

diurpagissa: 👍

driud: The question is whether the "Germans" will even wake up in time?
They have then been manipulated so that they will no longer understand this command!

1612533810_14bm4C2yZgQkeB6SYLABAPwDboQFH.body: Warum die Grippe weg ist? Sie heißt jetzt Corona!

Die WHO gibt es selber zu dass der PCR-Test ein Betrug ist.
Robert Farle: WHO bestätigt AfD-Fraktion – Der PCR-Test-Betrug muss aufhören
https://invidiou.site/watch?v=o_4fbuhnC9Q
Link zur: Drucksache Drucksache7/7164 vom 25.01.2021
https://www.landtag.sachsen-anhalt.de/fileadmin/files/drs/wp7/drs/d7164aan.pdf

Und warum unterschreibt KEIN Arzt voll haftend und rechtsgültig so ein Formular wie dieses hier z.B.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/14SKZnJRicQyg2iqV7Zq1Jjv2b6mpBb84h/pdf_files/formulare/Formular_Corona-Test_2020-41.pdf

1614402994_168Diza6QrAArkHB5AFJESWpNAkKg.body: Official v0.6.6 release only for Windows? When will retroshare be available for Linux (deb/rpm) and Mac?
When will retroshare be available for Linux (deb/rpm)?

1620169498_14EvrR9QiEpqhQyZDFiftdgAXzNQ1.body:
Thank you for the link.
The message:
Latest version: 0.7.2 (rev4555)
Your version: 0.6.5 (rev3870)
"Outdated!"
But when I click on "Update to latest version" nothing happens. :-(
And then just insert users.json and all my data is back and I can continue working?
If I copy/backup my "data" folder, then I have everything I need and can continue to use and edit my pages?

> [styromaniac](#comment_3080_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): The latest copy of your users.json contains your latest thread subscriptions. [...]
Hello, thank you.
But have a problem now, when I edited, saved and published a page, it is NOT updated in the "zeronet.now.im".

> [styromaniac](#comment_3083_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You should have mentioned ZeroNet.now.im. [...]

https://zeronet.now.im/1NHNRFGzTmtbCRBhjfvzsiKZtzGQSGWZeb/
Here the e.g. content is missing.

> [styromaniac](#comment_3084_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You have to wait for changes to propagate.

Hi, I just wanted to say thank you for all the help.
MANY THANKS
The upgrade to 0.7.x worked.

The proxy https://zeronet.now.im/ seems to have some problems updating the pages. That's why I use https://0net-preview.com when the other one has problems.

Once again, thank you very much.
